title: Superfood chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['220g brown sugar', '145g coconut sugar', '115g butter, softened', '120ml coconut oil', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons hot water', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '375g plain flour', '170g dark chocolate chips', '60g chopped walnuts', '30g chia seeds', '30g milled flaxseeds', '45g cocoa nibs', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
